code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from"react";import{useParams,Link}from"react-router-dom";import{Container,Spinner,Alert}from"react-bootstrap";import"./HealthBlog.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HealthBlogDetail=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[blog,setBlog]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{setLoading(true);fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_BASE_URL,"/healthblogs/").concat(id)).then(res=>{if(!res.ok)throw new Error("Failed to fetch blog.");return res.json();}).then(data=>{setBlog(data);setLoading(false);}).catch(err=>{console.error(err);setError("Blog not found or something went wrong.");setLoading(false);});},[id]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Spinner,{animation:"border",variant:"primary"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"mt-3",children:"Loading blog..."})]});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"text-center mt-5",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Alert,{variant:"danger",children:error}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/healthblog",className:"d-inline-block mt-3",children:"\u2190 Back to blog"})]});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Container,{className:"health-blog-detail",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/healthblog",className:"mb-3 d-inline-block blog-back",children:"\u2190 Back to blog"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"detail-title mb-2",children:blog.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"text-muted",children:["By ",blog.author," \u2013 ",blog.date]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:"".concat(process.env.PUBLIC_URL,"/asset/image/healthBlog/").concat(blog.thumbnail),alt:blog.title,className:"img-fluid rounded mb-4 detail-image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"detail-content",dangerouslySetInnerHTML:{__html:blog.content}})]});};export default HealthBlogDetail;
